A Message for Shebna

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, say \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w steward|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* doing \w here|strong="H6311"\w*, \w and|strong="H4908"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* authorized \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w carve|strong="H2710"\w* \w out|strong="H2672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tomb|strong="H6913"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* yourself \w here|strong="H6311"\w*—\w to|strong="H3588"\w* chisel \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w tomb|strong="H6913"\w* \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w height|strong="H4791"\w* \w and|strong="H4908"\w* \w cut|strong="H2672"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w resting|strong="H4908"\w* \w place|strong="H4908"\w* \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*?

\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1397"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w*! \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w about|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* shake \w you|strong="H2904"\w* violently. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* take hold \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H2904"\w*,

I will remove \w you|strong="H2040"\w* \w from|strong="H1920"\w* \w office|strong="H4612"\w*, \w and|strong="H2040"\w* \w you|strong="H2040"\w* will be ousted \w from|strong="H1920"\w* \w your|strong="H2040"\w* position.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7926"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w key|strong="H4668"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w What|strong="H1732"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w opens|strong="H6605"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H1004"\w* \w can|strong="H1004"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w what|strong="H1732"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w shuts|strong="H5462"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H1004"\w* \w can|strong="H1004"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w*.\f + \fr 22:22 \ft See Revelation 3:7.\f*
